Detailed Description

template<class EOT>
class eoInnerExchangeQuadOp< EOT >

Crossover using an AtomCrossover.

Probably irrelevant in Variable Length - see eoFlOrBinOp.h and eoFlOrQuadOp.h for the similar Fixed Length operators
